resources.string: This function needs to access device storage, please grant requested permissions to this APP. Otherwise, it might be malfunctioning.
Please finish or cancel paste operation first
Selected items cannot be pasted in any original folder…
Please enter a single folder to paste selected items…
One or more files cannot be deleted…
One or more files cannot be renamed…
Do you want to add the selected items to favorite?
Do you want to remove the selected items from favorite?
Do you want to move the selected items to private storage (Invisible in other applications)?
Do you want to unlock the selected items from private?
Do you want to PERMANENTLY delete the selected item? It CANNOT be recovered.
Items have been copied to private storage, do you want to delete them from the database?
Items have been moved out of private storage.
If filter is enabled, only GIF/Video links will be displayed.
If filter is disabled, all links will be displayed, unsupported links will be opened by browser.
Sign in to get more results
Please input a keyword to start searching.
Loading in progress. Please try again later.

You haven\'t set the home folder for this APP to store downloaded/private/edited content. Please set up it first.\nIf you have used this app before, please use the exiting home folder to make sure you can still access all your saved/private contents.\nClick help button to see a short video guide on Youtube.
Do you want to set the selected folder as the home directory of this app?\nFuture downloaded/private/edited content will be put in this folder.
You can protect these contents by identity check if you setup device lock.
Your identity need to be verified before viewing these contents.
No operation is allowed on private folder, change it in other app might also cause data loss.
Do you want to move selected items out of private storage? They will be moved to corresponding folder in the home directory of this app. And will be visible in gallery and other applications.
Click to add a folder to access device storage
Cannot request to access file folders on this device, please check if you have correctly installed file manager app.
Do you want to withdraw the permission to access the selected folders?\nThey will not be deleted but just removed from this app if you revoked the permission.
Android system will scan the items if they are eligible to be added into media library…
Do you want to delete the empty folders in current directory?
No folder is blocked currently. To filter out a folder, please open gallery and make sure items are grouped by path, then long press the folder title and click the block option.

***IMPORTANT NOTICE***


Android has restricted storage access of apps.
Newly upgraded app has to use storage access framework APIs. Please click the above '⊕' button to open the system file explorer and choose a target folder to allow this app to access.

If you have formerly used this app, better find the old app storage folder from the opened system file explorer. Open it, and click the bottom button to grant access and confirm the permission request.

After that you must long press the item and select the [HOME] option to make it the home folder of this app. Only in this way you can access your former stored private items.

On some Android device which you might not be able to see all the folders in the internal storage. Please click the menu option of the system file explorer to show whole internal storage. And then select it from the left drawer menu to start with.

To migrate old home folder to a new place, please use file manager app to move the whole folder to the target position. And set that folder as home in this app.

No private content to be displayed currently.

You can select content item from gallery and choose the lock menu option to make them private.

If you already have private content before, please make sure you have set the correct home directory for this app in file explorer.
No favourite content to be displayed currently.\n\nYou can select content item from gallery and choose the favourite menu option to save them as favourite content.
Scale to fit screen with cropping
Scale to fit screen in center
Cannot open live wallpaper settings, please long press on blank area of your home screen, go to wallpaper settings. And select this app from the live wallpaper settings.

To use the selected item as wallpaper, apply it in live wallpaper settings. Please do NOT move/rename/delete the content which you have set as wallpaper, otherwise, you have to reset it for the wallpaper to work normally.

WARNING:
Use video or animation as wallpaper will INCREASE the power consumption.

And due to performance limitation, video wallpaper can not be scaled to fit in screen center. You might want to edit the content to fit the screen size before use it as wallpaper.
Wallpaper content is invalid or not set yet.\nPlease open gallery in this app, long press to select an video or animation item, and choose \'set as wallpaper\' in the action menu.
